decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

DN 02 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed Site Plan) Page 2 of 10; DN 03 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan) Page 3 of 10; DN 04 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan) Page 4 of 10; DN 05 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plan) Page 5 of 10; DN 06 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed Elevations) Page 6 of 10; DN 07 - Rev B (Existing and Proposed Sections) Page 7 of 10; DN 08 - Rev B (Proposed 3D Views) Page 8 of 10; DN 09 - Rev B (Proposed 3D Views) Page 9 of 10; DN 10 - Rev B (Proposed 3D Views) Page 10 of 10
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey wraparound extension (following partial demolition of existing rear extension); Juliette balcony to first floor and installation of three rooflights
